title: Daily reminder Kalista and Reksai stupid OP.
body: You will argue with me now, but you will see shortly as the pro scenes is soon to begin.

replies.body:
I don't think anyone would argue about Rek being overtuned right now, but I wouldn't call her overpowered.

I save the term overpowered for champions that are actually warping the game in a negative fashion.  Rek is just a Fighter who needs to have damage adjusted a bit.

Rek sai is overpowered?
LOL
Funny stuff.

Rek'Sai is strong, may need a touch more toning down, we'll see.

Kalista, well... most people realize she's really not that great.

Rek gives 30 gold away to supports just to make a basic jump. I don't think she's overpowered. I tried playing her and I got a huge Nidalee vibe(way too much morphing and the playing concept hurts my brain) from her.
